name: Vest of the Cockroach
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Vest of the Cockroach

sections.body: This padded and slightly bulky vest, made from dyed, red-brown cloth, causes its wearer to feel vaguely uncomfortable whenever lying prone. If the wearer is a rogue, she gains the resiliency rogue talent. If she already has this talent, activating the talent grants her 2 hit points per rogue level instead of 1.
sections.name: Description
